Mood: This elegant art gallery, spacious with a minimalist design, is intimate and flooded with natural light from skylights and large windows. The venue, boasting a high ceiling and wooden floors, strictly prohibits furniture, loud music, dancing, open house events, smoking, open flames, and late-night parties.
Spotless, bright sanctuary featuring a secluded pool and patio.

Venue Name: Versatile, sunny event room in North Beach
Mood: The venue has an open layout featuring wooden floors, abundant tables, a full-length bar, and a backyard.

Venue Name: Art Gallery + Plant Store - Outer Richmond
Mood: This vibrant art gallery boasts high ceilings and is filled with natural daylight, thanks to its storefront windows. Its interior is adorned with plentiful live plants, minimalist furniture, and an array of artwork, creating an artsy and cozy ambiance. The venue is lit by modern LED track lights, set against the backdrop of a sealed concrete floor. It offers ample space suitable for standing cocktail events or classroom-style seating. The gallery maintains a connection to the street through its open storefront.

Creative 2-story loft with exposed timber, sandblasted concrete walls, floor to ceiling glass, soaring ceilings, lantern skylights, designer furniture and postmodern cabinetry. A lot of shelves. Furniture. . Whiteboard and table. Perfect for company off-sites, private parties or media production with work stations for 10, three large conference rooms for breakout groups, and an elegant patio, living, dining and kitchen area for celebrating, team-building, networking or entertaining.Very modern decor and interior design.

This two-story loft features a creative design with elements such as exposed timber, sandblasted concrete walls, and floor-to-ceiling glass. Its high ceilings, lantern skylights, designer furniture, and postmodern cabinetry lend a modern aesthetic. The space is well-equipped with ample shelving, a whiteboard, and a table. It is ideal for company off-sites, private parties, or media production, offering workstations for 10, three large conference rooms for breakout groups, and a stylish patio, living, dining, and kitchen area for socializing and team-building activities.
This bohemian two-story venue boasts a private garden and a plethora of art. Despite its compact size, it offers a fairly spacious basement.
An intimate, modern venue filled with numerous chairs and tables, bathed in ample sunlight, and perfect for relaxed, casual gatherings.

The venue is open and apt for coworking, adorned with plants and modern furniture, including tables and chairs. Original wooden-framed windows embellish the solarium, which showcases both shiny hardwood and raw concrete floors. One wall of the solarium is made of painted brick, while the opposite one is concrete.
The rooftop venue, adorned with numerous tables and chairs, exudes an intimate atmosphere complemented by its modern design. Its lighting is particularly stunning at night.
This is an adaptable, high-ceilinged open space, minimally furnished and featuring some art, which allows for versatile decoration options.

The venue features ceilings adorned with skylights, sandblasted concrete walls, and a vast 3000 square foot white oak dance floor. Two ADA-compliant bathrooms are conveniently located near the lobby. A 900 square foot lofted area offers a panoramic view of the main space. An attached building houses a kitchen, two more ADA bathrooms, and an additional 1000 square foot space for dancing or events. The combined area of these spaces totals 7500 square feet, ideal for a range of occasions including weddings, performances, parties, meetings, and lectures.

Venue Name: Intimate, Luxury Event Space in the Heart of FiDi
Mood: This elegantly arranged venue, graced with curated furniture and art, offers an intimate environment perfect for co-working and collaboration. The abundance of natural light enhances the aesthetically pleasing space, adorned with items sourced from local flea markets and a vintage library. Custom furniture contributes to a uniquely warm ambiance, a rare find in FiDi. The versatile event floor can be emptied, arranged for a theater-style presentation, or adapted for small group workshops.

The venue comprises three distinct spaces. The first, a large studio, features refinished wooden floors, white concrete walls, and partially frosted windows offering natural light from the Northwest. It has curtains on the entry side for additional privacy. The second, a front studio, includes a sisal carpet, white concrete walls, and Southeast-facing floor-to-ceiling windows which can be enclosed with curtains. The neutral palette is enhanced by a Quan Yin statue and complemented by a TV monitor and shelving. This space is adaptable, having served as a location for yoga, group meditation, livestreaming classes, and a co-working environment. The third, dubbed the White Couch Lounge, is a cozy sitting area furnished with white vinyl couches arranged in an L shape, wooden coffee tables, and ottomans. It's a versatile spot for meetings, co-working, tea tastings, meditation, and podcast recordings.

An architecturally-designed modern house is situated in the heart of Silicon Valley. Its interior is tastefully furnished and bathed in ample light, evoking a luxurious vibe. The backyard, equally stunning and well-lit, contributes to the overall beauty of the property.

This hidden gem of an urban winery, nestled in the Peninsula's heart, boasts a unique and charming ambiance coupled with delightful artisan wines. It's a versatile venue suitable for private and corporate gatherings, including team building exercises, charity events, holiday celebrations, wine tastings, and culinary parties.
